millsfield:images_texts:
memory is one which you will long cherish. Single
passengers, $15.00. Special rates for parties.
BIMINI-NASSAU AIR LINES- Regular service
to the Bahama Island ports.
Over the Gulf Stream
to Bimini in 50 minutes and from thence to Nassau
in another 90 minutes.
Nothing can surpass the
beauty of these coral islands as viewed from the air.
They set like gems in a sea of azure blue and never
until the advent of aviation have even their inhabi-
tants realized their glorious colorings. Your esthetic
self will be transported to higher realms than even
the staunchest airplane could carry you.
TO CUBA BY AIR- Over the Keys of southern
Florida. A panoramic survey of the gigantic engin-
cering feat accomplished by the Florida East Coast
Railway. Then by way of Key West to Morro Castle
-the Bastile of America's Paris- -Havana.
PASSPORTS For passengers who wish to em-
bark for points abroad, a short notice will be neces-
sary in order that they may obtain passports,
matter which will be facilitated by the Passenger
Department, every effort being made to help pas-
sengers in obtaining the required papers.
Delavs
are rarelv experienced.
In conclusion let us say that a trip in the air
under the conditions of safety and comfort provided
by Aero Limited is an attraction difficult to resist.
Travel through the air is smooth and steady and
devoid of any obstacle or restriction such as no
perfect roadway or water route can boast.
Ask
anyone who has made a trip.
AERO LIMITED
First Aerial Passenger Routes in America
New York, N. Y.
20 W. 34th St.
Miami, Fla.
Nassau, B. I.
Elser's Pier
C. Nicholas Reinhardt, G. P. A
R. T. Bellchambers, P. A.
